mapper.insert: INSERT INTO model(model_name, base_url, api_key, completions_path, model_version) VALUES(#{modelName}, #{baseUrl}, #{apiKey}, #{completionsPath}, #{modelVersion})
mapper.update: UPDATE model SET model_name = #{modelName}, base_url = #{baseUrl}, api_key = #{apiKey}, completions_path = #{completionsPath}, model_version = #{modelVersion} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, model_name, base_url, api_key, completions_path, model_version, create_time, update_time FROM model
SELECT id, model_name, base_url, api_key, completions_path, model_version, create_time, update_time FROM model WHERE id = (select modelId from avatar where id = #{avatarId})
